text: The following lists events that happened during 2007 in Cape Verde. ==Incumbents== *President: Pedro Pires *Prime Minister: José Maria Neves ==Events== *First publication of newspaper A Nação *Cape Verde signed two UN conventions, the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and the International Convention for the Protection of All Persons from Enforced Disappearance *November: Expansion of Rabil Airport (now Aristides Pereira International Airport) completed *December: desalination plant opened in Porto Novo, Santo Antão ==Sports== *Sporting Clube da Praia won the Cape Verdean Football Championship *Académica da Praia won the Taça Nacional de Cabo Verde ==Deaths== *João Vário (b. 1937), writer ==References== Category:Years of the 21st century in Cape Verde Category:2000s in Cape Verde Cape Verde Cape Verde
title: 2007 in Cape Verde
